reporter_caption.center: REST-HAVEN MEM. PARK v. CITY OF EUGENE, 189 Or. App. 150 (2003)

caption.center: REST-HAVEN MEMORIAL PARK and CHARLES WIPER, III, Petitioners, v. CITY OF

opinion.posture: Judicial Review from Land Use Board of Appeals.
opinion.attorneys:
Bill Kloos argued the cause and filed the brief for petitioners.
Emily N. Jerome argued the cause for respondent. With her on the brief were Glenn Klein, Kathryn P. Brotherton, and Harrang Long Gary Rudnick, P.C.
opinion.panel: Before LANDAU, Presiding Judge, and ARMSTRONG and BREWER, Judges.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed. Rest-Haven Memorial Park v. City of Eugene (A121207),189 Or. App. 90, 74 P.3d 1107 (Aug 6, 2003).Page 151
